text: Marguerite Wendy Jenkins (also Wendy Barrie; 18 April 1912 â€“ 2 February 1978) was a British-born American actress who worked in British and American movies. She played Pamela Starr in Women in War (1940). She also played Ann Patterson in Submarine Alert. Barrie was born in Hong Kong. She died following a stroke in Englewood, New Jersey. title: Wendy Barrie
